name: YTTracker
author: Thomas Couchoud <zerderr@gmail.com> (https://github.com/MrCraftCod/)
description: This extension will track your time on YouTube

scripts.manifest: cd extension && cp manifestProd.json manifest.json && cd ../
scripts.manifestTest: cd extension && cp manifestTest.json manifest.json && cd ../
scripts.zip: cd extension && zip -r extension.zip ./* && cd ../ && mv extension/extension.zip extension.zip
scripts.release: npm run manifest && npm run zip && webstore upload --file extension.zip --extension-id knnlnielflnfhdohmihofhdelgahgjdb --client-id $CLIENT_ID --client-secret $CLIENT_SECRET --refresh-token $REFRESH_TOKEN --auto-publish
scripts.releaseTest: npm run manifestTest && npm run zip && webstore upload --file extension.zip --extension-id moboafdnejnjnppicfiadaalobjeemec --client-id $CLIENT_ID_TEST --client-secret $CLIENT_SECRET_TEST --refresh-token $REFRESH_TOKEN_TEST --auto-publish
